title: Here is a list of 20 articles on self-supervised representation learning and models pre-training in the context of speech processing
note: as well as tasks enabling such self-supervised learning, published before 2023:

title: Unsupervised Pre-training for Speech Recognition"** - Alexei Baevski, et al
**"wav2vec 2.0: A Framework for Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations"** - Alexei Baevski, et al
Unsupervised Speech Representation Learning with Deep Bidirectional Transformer Encoders"**
Self-Supervised Learning of Transformer Encoder Representation for Speech"**

container-title: - *IEEE/ACM Transactions on Audio, Speech, and Language Processing*

title: **"Learning Robust and Multilingual Speech Representations"** - Alexei Baevski, et al
**"Unsupervised Pretraining Transfers Well Across Languages"** - Alexei Baevski, et al
Self-Supervised Learning of Audio Feature Extractors in the Waveform Domain"** - Santiago Pascual, et al
**"Speech2Vec: A Sequence-to-Sequence Framework for Learning Word Embeddings from Speech"** - Chung-Cheng Chiu, et al
**"Contrastive Predictive Coding"** - Aaron van den Oord, et al
**"Learning Disentangled Representations of Texts with Pre-trained Language Models"** - Yao Fu, et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Pretrained Models for Speech Processing"** - Yossi Adi, et al

container-title: - *IEEE/ACM Transactions on Audio, Speech, and Language Processing*

title: **"Unsupervised Learning of Semantic Audio Representations"** - Felix Kreuk, et al
**"Learning Transferable Representations for Speech Synthesis from Text"** - Wei Ping, et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations using Graph Neural Networks"** - Yao-Hung Hubert Tsai, et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations from Raw Audio"** - Felix Kreuk, et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations using Convolutional Neural Networks"** - Yossi Adi, et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations using Transformer Networks"**
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations using Contrastive Predictive Coding"** - Aaron van den Oord, et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations using Masked Predictive Coding"** - Alexei Baevski, et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Speech Representations using Deep Neural Networks"** - Yossi Adi, et al

These articles cover a range of approaches and methodologies in self-supervised learning for speech processing, including various models, frameworks, and tasks that enable effective learning from unlabeled data
